thread.title: BRIEF-NRG Yield Operating Announces Extension Of Consent Solicitation For Its 5.375 Pct Senior Notes Due 2024

title: BRIEF-NRG Yield Operating Announces Extension Of Consent Solicitation For Its 5.375 Pct Senior Notes Due 2024
text:
April 2, 2018 / 11:59 AM / Updated 11 minutes ago BRIEF-NRG Yield Operating Announces Extension Of Consent Solicitation For Its 5.375 Pct Senior Notes Due 2024 Reuters Staff 1 Min Read 
April 2 (Reuters) - NRG Yield Inc: 
* NRG YIELD OPERATING LLC, A SUBSIDIARY OF NRG YIELD, INC., ANNOUNCES EXTENSION OF CONSENT SOLICITATION FOR ITS 5.375% SENIOR NOTES DUE 2024 AND 5.000% SENIOR NOTES DUE 2026 
* ‍NRG YIELD OPERATING LLC SAYS EXTENDED CONSENT SOLICITATION UNTIL 5:00 P.M. NEW YORK CITY TIME, ON APRIL 4, 2018​ Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
